name: Lock screen - water droplets
description: Lock screen droplets water Keypad lock screen Animations of water droplets naturally Lock screen by passcode The best lock screen application, to help you protect your privacy, prevent others trying to access your phone illegally. This lock screen app has a beautiful lock screen with many water droplets.   Features: - set password with numbers - high security, prevent accessing your phone without password - user can change background of lock screen - show state of mobile as network, wifi, battery .. in lock screen - multiple wallpaper to choose, you can choose your own wallpaper from gallery too. - set passcode to enhance screen lock security, disable HOME/MENU/BACK key,no one can access your phone without correct password - consume less memory and battery,simple and clean design - support over 50 languages - work well on phone, tablet devices
